short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabEase streamlines online browsing with customizable tab groups and efficient navigation features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabEase is a browser extension and web application created to simplify and optimize online browsing. With TabEase, users can effortlessly organize their browser tabs into custom groups, enabling efficient navigation. The extension offers tab management features, which includes switching groups by opening and closing tabs in bulk or by opening tabs in a new window. TabEase aims to simplify the complexities of tab organization, providing users with a seamless and personalized browsing environment.
